original_text: Those that were numbered of them, according to the number of all the males, from a month old and upward, even those that were numbered of them were seven thousand and five hundred.
korean_text: 계수된 자 곧 일 개월 이상 된 남자의 수효 합계는 칠천오백 명이며

sentences.original_text: Those that were numbered of them
according to the number of all the males
from a month old and upward
even those that were numbered of them
were seven thousand and five hundred
